epics.description: Implement a secure user authentication system with login, registration, and password recovery

stories.description: Users should be able to create an account with email and password
Users should be able to log in with their credentials
Users should be able to reset their password via email

epics.description: Allow users to manage their profile information and preferences

stories.description: Users should be able to update their profile information
Users should be able to change their password while logged in
Users should be able to upload and update their profile picture
